attributes.action: Recognise Natural Immunity from Covid, as equivalent to being Fully Vaccinated.
attributes.additional_details:
Millions of people in the UK have recovered from Covid and have demonstrated a strong, long lasting immune response, exceeding that of the current generations of vaccines. 

Studies have shown that natural immunity confers greater protection and lower transmission rates than the current vaccines.

A person that can prove their antibody status, through a test, should be afforded the same rights in society as the fully vaccinated. 

https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2021.08.24.21262415v1
attributes.background: In line with other countries that recognise natural immunity from prior Covid infection as a legitimate form immunity. I would ask the Government to match the current requirements regarding travel and restrictions to be the same as those who have been fully vaccinated.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Recognise immune response to Covid-19 in the Covid pass
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600576
